returns.slippageReduced: Amount of slippage removed from accumulator

params.fromAmount: Amount of source tokens to swap
params.minOut: Minimum amount of destination tokens to receive

params._initialSlippageThreshold: Initial slippage threshold in USD (18 decimals)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newThreshold: New slippage threshold in USD (18 decimals)

cleanSlippageHistory().notice: Clean up old slippage history entries

depositSwapParaSwapV6(bytes4,bytes,addre.notice: Deposit from one token pool to another using ParaSwap v6
